text: Football Center Kovel-Volyn Kovel is a Ukrainian football team based in Kovel, Ukraine. The club used to play in the Ukrainian Second Division and also served as a reserve team for the FC Volyn Lutsk franchise. The club was established in 1986 as Silmash Kovel. The club fields senior, junior and female teams. ==Honours== * Football Federation of Volyn ** Winners (8): 1995, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2013 ** Runner-up (1): 2011 * Volyn Cup ** Winners (2): 2011, 2018 ==External links== * Kovel-Volyn (Ковель-Волинь (Волинська обл.)). AAFU. Category:Amateur football clubs in Ukraine Category:Football clubs in Volyn Oblast Category:FC Volyn Lutsk Category:Ukrainian reserve football teams Category:1986 establishments in Ukraine
title: FC Kovel-Volyn Kovel
